Message.Title: the real scandal at the IRS: special tax breaks for the super rich
Message.Msg: The real scandal is that: The IRS has interpreted our tax laws to allow big corporations and wealthy individuals to make unlimited secret campaign donations through sham political fronts called “social welfare organizations,” like Karl Rove’s “Crossroads,” the U.S. Chamber of Commerce, and “Priorites USA.” This campaign money has been used to bribe Congress to keep in place tax loopholes like the “carried interest” rule that allows the managers of hedge funds and private equity funds to treat their income as capital gains, subject only to low capital gains taxes rather than ordinary income taxes, and other loopholes that allow CEOs to get special tax treatment on giant compensation packages that now average $10 million a year. Robert Reich

Topic.Title: the real scandal at the IRS: special tax breaks for the super rich

Message.Msg: WASHINGTON – There's an irony in the Internal Revenue Service's crackdown on conservative groups. The nation's tax agency has admitted to inappropriately scrutinizing smaller tea party organizations that applied for tax-exempt status, and senior Treasury Department officials were notified in the midst of the 2012 presidential election season that an internal investigation was underway. But the IRS largely maintained a hands-off policy with the much larger, big-budget organizations on the left and right that were most influential in the elections and are organized under a section of the tax code that allows them to hide their donors. "The IRS goes AWOL when wealthy and powerful forces want to break the law in order to hide their wrongful efforts and secret political influence," said Rhode Island Sen. Sheldon Whitehouse, a Democrat who is among a small Senate group pushing campaign finance reform measures that would force these big outside groups to disclose their donors. "Picking on the little guy is a pretty lousy thing to do."

Message.Title: the facts suggest a relatively well meaning misstep by the IRS
Message.Msg: IRS overview . No question the IRS engaged in profiling which we all know conservatives oppose in all its ugly forms. Jokes aside, the facts suggest a relatively well meaning misstep by the IRS . IRS is brutally understaffed due to GOP congressional denials of funds for additional agents needed to collect the unpaid taxes legitimately owed by Americans , estimated at $385 billion yearly in 2006. BTW-estimates are that every enforcement agent hired will return 8-10X his salary in legitimately owed taxes to the Treasury for those really worried about fairness and deficits. Citizens United triggered a bi-partisan, 4X increase in requests for tax exempt status. No secret that many political groups on both sides would attempt to portray themselves as apolitical to avoid taxes. Some harried IRS employees mistakenly decided to make their life easier by profiling groups with the blatantly political "tea party" in their names. Not illogical,examples exist it worked in many cases but CLEARLY wrong ethically. Those directly responsible should be canned , some already have been and more inquiries are being made. To date, no evidence I've seen indicates the policy was initiated by anyone in the White House. SCOTUS and the GOP congress are not guilt free here either

Message.Title: why do conservatives want to hide who makes political donations?
Message.Msg: "...About 85 percent of the money that was spent by nonprofits in the 2012 cycle, as reported to the FEC, was paid out by conservative groups. These groups, unlike the more commonly known super PACs, are not required to divulge the names of their donors, and much of their spending is unreported, too. Their annual tax filings with the IRS list how much money they have, who their officers are and the recipients of any grants they may have made. But when they spend their money directly in support of or opposition to a candidate, they must report to the Federal Election Commission......."

Topic.Title: mob violence. Blacks attacking whites

Message.Msg: here's a very recent example just happened in Baton Rouge A white family stopping for gas in Baton Rouge, Louisiana was attacked by three men and police are not ruling out the possibility of charging hate crime white familythe assailants with a hate crime. The attack occurred on Sunday night at a local Chevron station after a man, his wife, and his daughter stopped for gas. The family was apparently attacked without cause and the attack was so brutal that it sent the husband to the hospital. There has already been a push online to charge the attackers with a hate crime for targeting the white family in a mostly black city. Cpl. Tommy Stubbs of the Baton Rouge Police Department confirmed the arrests of Donald Dickerson on suspicion of second-degree battery and have also issued summons to Devin Bessey, 24, and Ashley Simmons, 22, for simple battery. Stubbs says the male victim went into the gas station store where he was confronted by Dickerson who told him that he was in the “wrong neighborhood.” When the victim’s wife tried to help, she was knocked unconscious by Bessey. The couple’s 14 year old daughter was punched by Simmons when she tried to come to her parent’s aid.

Topic.Title: mob violence. Blacks attacking whites

Message.Msg: another example in Jacksonville fla. When the people of Jacksonville learned a mob of at least 15 black people had attacked an elderly white man, kicking him and beating him with a big stick, many were not surprised. There had been at least three other reports of black mob violence in that area in the two days surrounding the Friday attack. And just two weeks before that, four black people were arrested in connection with the murder of a 13-month old child during a robbery in that area. But this latest example of black mob violence was different in at least two ways: first, at least one local media outlet identified the mob as black – a rarity among the 500 black mob attacks throughout the country documented in the book “White Girl Bleed a Lot, the return of racial violence and how the media ignore it.” The local daily paper in Jacksonville has yet to do a story on the assault. The second surprise was that two Good Samaritans came to the man’s aid, stopping their car, driving away the attackers, and saving the man from further serious injury. Or worse. The Good Samaritans were black. One of the heroes was a woman, who asked the Jacksonville ABC affiliate to hide her identity out of fear of retribution. She described the attack: “We seen a whole bunch of African-American kids you know, beating and stomping on an elderly Caucasian guy and he had bags and everything, he couldn’t even defend himself because it was so many kids,” said the anonymous witness. “Between 10 or 15 kids it could have been more because they just scattered like ants when we came back around.”

Message.Msg: "of the 6,225 known offenders, 62.4 percent were white, 18.5 percent were black, and 7.3 percent were groups of individuals of various races. The race was unknown for 10.2 percent of offenders, and other races accounted for the remaining offenders." FBI Hate Crime Statistics, 2009 report. Some of the general findings include: Victims ◾61.1 percent of all hate crimes were committed against persons, while 38.1 percent were crimes against property. ◾Of the 4,057 victims of racial bias, 71.5 percent were victims because of an offender’s prejudice against blacks. ◾Of the 1,575 victims of anti-religious hate crimes, 71.9 percent were victims because of an offender’s anti-Jewish bias. Offenders ◾Of the 6,225 known offenders, 62.4 percent were white, 18.5 percent were black, and 7.3 percent were groups of individuals of various races. The race was unknown for 10.2 percent of offenders, and other races accounted for the remaining offenders. ◾Of the 5,136 offenders who carried out crimes against persons, 40.3 percent committed simple assaults, 34.6 percent intimidated their victims, and 23.5 percent committed aggravated assaults. I reiterate, what if this corruption happened during Bush's term? The libs would be squealing like pigs nonstop.

Topic.Title: t black on white crime is never a hate crime. Ever notice that?

Message.Msg: How about Black on BlacK? Bet you never heard of the African chief that received a rifle as a gift from a British explorer.. He wanted to see it work so he motioned one of his people forward and shot him. Read a little on Robert "The Beast" Mugabe and how he treats his people in Zimbabwe. The Brits and Boers were never that vicious. When Zimbabwe was Rhodesia. it fed it's own people and exported food to all of Africa. Now? No more exports and the populace is half starved. My grandfather was a So. "racist". Yet, when Blacks needed a sworn statement for their age for old age assistence they went to him. If they were hungry he let them take vegetables from his garden. Some would come to the front porch in the evening and they and my grandfather would exchange jokes until bed time. My grandfather was not rich but was able to support himself and 11 children by two wives. He was born in 1864 in Huntsville, Ala.

Topic.Title: Obama gaining in popularity (ha ha ha ha, loser pubs have egg on their face)

Message.Msg: That may be the clearest message from a CNN/ORC poll released Sunday morning. According to the survey, which was conducted Friday and Saturday, 53 percent of Americans say they approve of the job the president is doing, with 45 percent saying they disapprove, CNN reports. That’s actually a tick better than the 51 percent approval rating Obama had in early April –

Topic.Title: More Crock From Our Biggest Leftwing Goon

Message.Msg: My mom and dad were Southern Democrats. They switched when "Rosie The Red" started cuddling up to the commies in the thirties. Rosie once stated; "Some of my best friends are Communists". He proved it by putting them in positions to steal all the atomic secrets. Check out Harry Dexter White (Weiss) and how he gave the plates for German occupation scrip to the commies who used it to swindle the U.S. out of 600 million in the late forties. Ten times that amount now.
